name: Favored Judgment

sections.body: Select a favored race from the ranger's favored enemies chart. Any sacred or profane bonus you gain from a judgment is 1 higher for attacks you make against or take from creatures that match the selected favored enemy.
sections.name: Benefits

sections.body: You can gain this feat multiple times. Its effects do not stack. Each time you take the feat, it applies to a different favored enemy.
sections.name: Special

description: Your judgment against a particular type of creature is particularly harsh.
